name: a simple plataformer
description:
you just need to water your plant in this plataformer game!

press "s" to save your state (dosen't work in tutorial levels, boss fights, and titles)

press "l" to load your state (when you are not at the title) (dosent work  in tutorial levels, boss fights, and titles)

click the bosses to damage them.

(advise: this is just a demo (duh))
